item.title: Using Raspberry Pis to deliver Carpentries training in remote locations
item.description: CW21 Hack Day - 2021-03-31 to 2021-04-01 Lovelace-1842 - HP16-CW21 Hack Day idea proposer Becca Wilson Irma Hafidz Alison Clarke Talia Caplan Jannetta Steyn This document should be used to capture the information for a Hack Day Idea. Idea name (provisional) This is the provisional name of the Idea, solution or just a title; this can be changed later if a team is formed and you decide on a new team/product name.
